# Prep

[ ] backup stuff if you think you need it.
[ ] prepare USB device with a Windows installer.

# Repave

[ ] boot to the USB.
[ ] wipe old partitions.
[ ] run Windows installer.

# Post Paving

[ ] Windows update
[ ] Install Box Starter
[ ] Install my Box Starter Package
